about_the_game:
Storyline

You play as a young woman who has moved to a big city and found a surprisingly cheap apartment in one of the blocks on a housing estate. Although it’s quite far from your university and workplace, it offers excellent transport connections. However, the apartment has a story of its own - one you uncover through objects left behind and from local residents, whom you don’t always feel like interacting with but often can’t avoid.

Before long, you realize you’re not always alone in the apartment. Someone knows how to enter your home; perhaps someone who lived there before you.

Gameplay

New Face on the Block is a first-person horror walking simulator. Players will explore various locations, interact with the neighborhood’s residents, and uncover a compelling story that took place some time ago. The gameplay focuses on exploration, finding hidden items, and interacting with them to piece together the narrative. To progress, players will complete simple tasks that are integrated into the story.

The game emphasizes atmosphere, building tension and creating a sense of fear. While the game creates a tense atmosphere with immersive audio and occasional jump scares, it is primarily a psychological horror experience. It focuses on building suspense and anticipation rather than relying heavily on sudden scares. 

The story unfolds over the course of several evenings in an early-1990s housing estate. As players delve deeper into it, they will face decisions that influence the game's ending.

The game is designed to be completed in approximately 1 hour and 40 minutes.

content_descriptors.notes: The storyline and visuals involve some instances of violence and gore. Expect jump scares and terrifying scenes. We advise reasonable restrictions when selecting the game's audience.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core I5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 3 3300X
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core I7-8700K / AMD Ryzen 5 3600X
  • Graphics: GTX 1070 / RX 5600-XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: A psychological home-invasion horror set in the bleak post-Soviet year of 1992, featuring realistic graphics.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
